docs.snippet: Citigroup Inc is considering the sale of its retail-banking business in Japan, the Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.
docs.lead_paragraph: Citigroup Inc is considering the sale of its retail-banking business in Japan, the Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Citi Considering Sale of Japan Retail Banking Unit : WSJ
headline.print_headline: Citi Considering Sale of Japan Retail Banking Unit : WSJ

docs.snippet: Barcelona have lost an appeal against a decision to ban them from the transfer market for two consecutive windows, football's world governing body FIFA said in a statement on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona have lost an appeal against a decision to ban them from the transfer market for two consecutive windows, football's world governing body FIFA said in a statement on Wednesday.

headline.main: Barcelona Loses Appeal Against Transfer Ban
headline.print_headline: Barca Appeal Against Transfer Ban Rejected-FIFA

docs.snippet: Mario Balotelli's rollercoaster career took another twist on Thursday when he said goodbye to his AC Milan team-mates after training before an expected transfer to Liverpool.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mario Balotelli's rollercoaster career took another twist on Thursday when he said goodbye to his AC Milan team-mates after training before an expected transfer to Liverpool.

headline.main: Balotelli Says Farewell to Milan, May Be Heading for Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Balotelli Says Farewell to Milan, May Be Heading for Liverpool

docs.snippet: The disgraced Luis Suarez and ageing veterans Diego Forlan and Diego Lugano are all missing from the first post-World Cup Uruguay squad announced on Thursday for two friendlies in Asia next month.
docs.lead_paragraph: The disgraced Luis Suarez and ageing veterans Diego Forlan and Diego Lugano are all missing from the first post-World Cup Uruguay squad announced on Thursday for two friendlies in Asia next month.

headline.main: Uruguay Begin Renewal Without Lugano and Forlan
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Begin Renewal Without Lugano and Forlan

docs.snippet: Champions Paris St Germain were held to a 0-0 draw at lowly Evian after playing the last half-hour with 10 men following Yohan Cabaye's dismissal as their sluggish start to the Ligue 1 season continued on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Champions Paris St Germain were held to a 0-0 draw at lowly Evian after playing the last half-hour with 10 men following Yohan Cabaye's dismissal as their sluggish start to the Ligue 1 season continued on Friday.

headline.main: Ten-Man PSG Held 0-0 at Evian After Cabaye Dismissal
headline.print_headline: Ten-Man PSG Held 0-0 at Evian After Cabaye Dismissal

docs.snippet: The federal government has offered few clues as to whether it would allow interstate sales by medical cannabis growers, highlighting the fraught landscape of conflicting laws.
docs.lead_paragraph: The federal government has offered few clues as to whether it would allow interstate sales by medical cannabis growers, highlighting the fraught landscape of conflicting laws.
docs.abstract: Federal government is offering few clues as to whether it will allow interstate sales by medical cannabis growers, highlighting the fraught landscape of conflicting laws; Colorado growers seek to challenge interstate limits on shipping marijuana products.

headline.main: Bid to Expand Medical Marijuana Business Faces Federal Hurdles
headline.print_headline: Bid to Expand Medical Marijuana Business Faces Federal Hurdles

docs.snippet: Today is Monday, August 25, the 237th day of 2014. There are 128 days left in the year.
docs.lead_paragraph: Today is Monday, August 25, the 237th day of 2014. There are 128 days left in the year.

docs.snippet: Barcelona made errors in the transfer of under-age players but will go to CAS over the severity of the FIFA transfer ban for two consecutive windows, president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Sunday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona made errors in the transfer of under-age players but will go to CAS over the severity of the FIFA transfer ban for two consecutive windows, president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Sunday.

headline.main: Barca Made Errors Over Youth Transfers Says President
headline.print_headline: Barca Made Errors Over Youth Transfers Says President

docs.snippet: Having just waved goodbye to a player who constantly courted controversy, Liverpool rolled out the welcome mat to Mario Balotelli on Monday, whose maverick if inconsistent talent is perhaps only rivalled by his ability to cause mischief.
docs.lead_paragraph: Having just waved goodbye to a player who constantly courted controversy, Liverpool rolled out the welcome mat to Mario Balotelli on Monday, whose maverick if inconsistent talent is perhaps only rivalled by his ability to cause mischief.

headline.main: Liverpool Gamble on Mischief-Maker Balotelli to Replace Suarez
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Gamble on Mischief-Maker Balotelli to Replace Suarez
